name: FEED (Delightfullymad)
description:
Maintain balance in your cult as you keep it's god fed.

Pick up cultists and put them in zones to gain money or notoriety 

Notoriety gains you more recruitment and will gradually create new cultists.

Cultists costs money to maintain.

If only there was a use for the extra ones...

CONTROLS

ARROW KEYS - move

SPACE - Pick up / put down

Z - Open Quest Window

ESC - Quit
